title: BRIEF-Reliance Infrastructure Ltd Confirms Payment Of Interest Due On Non Convertible Debentures
text:
BRIEF-Reliance Infrastructure Ltd Confirms Payment Of Interest Due On Non Convertible Debentures

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Reliance Infrastructure Ltd Confirms Payment Of Interest Due On Non Convertible Debentures Oct 21 (Reuters) - Reliance Infrastructure Ltd : * RELIANCE INFRASTRUCTURE LTD - CONFIRM THAT INTEREST OF 174 MILLION RUPEES ON NON CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES OF SERIES 18 HAS BEEN PAID ON OCTOBER 19, 2019.

BRIEF-Reliance Infrastructure Ltd Confirms Payment Of Interest Due On Non Convertible Debentures
description: BRIEF-Reliance Infrastructure Ltd Confirms Payment Of Interest Due On Non Convertible Debentures
